name: Haunted Munchies
description:
Top-down Ghost Survival Shooter Game. 

You find yourself stranded at an island full of ghosts. You were found by an passing islander in the middle of its vacation. Can you wait 20 days for the boat to arrive in this mysterious island? 

This game is my first game made. I made the game in the GDevelop 5 engine. I am more an artist than a programmer. I have basic knowledge of programming, what I call "Gamer's Instinct" and played around with GMS at some point.

I hope everyone has fun playing and enjoy it.
